acceptance_criteria_verified.multi_step_one_commit_per_step: PASS — orchestration-service happy path confirms commitStepCheckpoint called once per completed step (2 calls for 2-step dev+qa plan)
acceptance_criteria_verified.no_diff_no_empty_commit: PASS — git-manager no-diff test confirms return false + no git commit call; orchestration-service confirms no step.committed event emitted
acceptance_criteria_verified.commit_failure_surfaces_in_events_and_ru: PASS — orchestration-service commit failure test confirms run.status=failed, run.error contains 'Git checkpoint commit failed at step 1', and step.failed event with error detail is emitted; PR is not created
acceptance_criteria_verified.pr_creation_still_works_with_per_step_co: PASS — both git-manager and orchestration-service PR compat tests confirm gh pr create succeeds normally after per-step commits

coverage.note: Coverage collection not configured in vitest.config.ts; raw counts not available. New tests cover all identified code paths for the per-step commit feature.
